sect2.title: Verifying thread safe and immutable classes
sect2.para: In this tutorial we walk through the complete assurance of the JSureTutorial_ThreadSafeAndImmutable project using JSure. Specifically, we assure the implementation of several classes that make up a simple 2D drawing framework. This tutorial focuses on the effective use of the @ThreadSafe and @Immutable annotations from Java Concurrency In Practice by Goetz, et. al. (Addison-Wesley 2006).
